sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar app color="primary" dark>
      <!-- Navigation icon for mobile view -->
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer" class="d-md-none"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
  
      <v-toolbar-title class="text-h6">Inventory Management</v-toolbar-title>
  
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
  
      <!-- Mobile view: Toggle button for navigation items -->
      <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer" class="d-md-none">
        <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
  
      <!-- Desktop view: Navigation buttons -->
      <v-btn text @click="navigateTo('dashboard')" class="d-none d-md-flex">Dashboard</v-btn>
      <v-btn text @click="navigateTo('products')" class="d-none d-md-flex">Products</v-btn>
      <v-btn text @click="navigateTo('orders')" class="d-none d-md-flex">Orders</v-btn>
      <v-btn text @click="navigateTo('settings')" class="d-none d-md-flex">Settings</v-btn>
  
      <!-- Cart Icon -->
      <v-btn icon @click="navigateTo('cart')" class="d-none d-md-flex">
        <v-icon>mdi-cart</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
  
      <!-- Cart Icon for Mobile View -->
      <v-btn icon @click="navigateTo('cart')" class="d-md-none">
        <v-icon>mdi-cart</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
  
      <!-- Drawer for mobile view -->
      <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" app temporary class="d-md-none">
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item @click="navigateTo('dashboard')">
            <v-list-item-content>Dashboard</v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item @click="navigateTo('products')">
            <v-list-item-content>Products</v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item @click="navigateTo('orders')">
            <v-list-item-content>Orders</v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item @click="navigateTo('settings')">
            <v-list-item-content>Settings</v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item @click="navigateTo('cart')">
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-icon>mdi-cart</v-icon>
              Cart
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>
    </v-app-bar>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'NavbarComponent',
    data() {
      return {
        drawer: false, // Control the drawer visibility
      };
    },
    methods: {
      navigateTo(page) {
        this.$router.push({ name: page });
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .v-app-bar {
    padding-left: 16px;
    padding-right: 16px;
  }
  </style>
